DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to evaluate the sparing effect of ketamine on the dose of propofol.
DOC.criteria: patients with an American Society of Anesthesiology score 1, 2 or 3 scheduled for a surgical procedure lasting more than 2 hours under general anesthesia pregnancy chronic pain simultaneous general and locoregional anesthesia contraindication to to nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug contraindication to Ketamine contraindication to propofol, to remifentanil, to morphine history of central nervous system disease patients receiving a psychotropic treatment patients with a pacemaker
